casebody.data:
Hazel F. Bittson, Respondent-Appellant, v. Anthony J. Bittson, Appellant-Respondent.

Appeal by defendant from a judgment granting plaintiff a separation, awarding alimony of $150 a week and $3,500 counsel fees and other *1062relief. Appeal by the plaintiff from so much of the judgment as awards counsel fees of $3,500 only. Judgment unanimously affirmed, without costs. No opinion. Present — Wenzel, Acting P. J., MacCrate, Schmidt, Beldoek and Ughetta, JJ. [See post, p. 1173.]
